commands.name: tempradio
commands.description: Apply temporary radio params (freq bw sf cr timeout_mins)

commands.name: set agc.reset.interval
commands.description: Set AGC reset interval (seconds, rounded to 4)

commands.name: set freq
commands.description: Set frequency MHz (serial only, reboot required)

commands.name: set radio
commands.description: Set radio params (freq bw sf cr)

commands.name: ver
commands.description: Show firmware version and build date
